events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but it doesn't fit, and I want to return it and get a refund.
The system has identified the issue as a refund request based on the customer's message.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for this case.
Hello! Thanks for reaching out. I understand you want to return the jacket and get a refund. I’m here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and explain if the jacket has any defects or if it's just a sizing issue?
The jacket is fine but way too small. The order number is 54321. I just want to get a full refund.
Thank you for the details. You can return the jacket using our prepaid shipping label, and once we receive it, we will process a full refund to your original payment method.
Great, thank you. I will send the jacket back as soon as possible using the label you provide.
I have emailed you the prepaid shipping label. Please send the jacket back within 14 days to complete the refund process.
Just checking in to confirm if you've shipped the jacket back and if you need any further assistance.
Yes, I shipped the jacket yesterday. Please let me know when the refund is processed.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund today. You should see the amount back in your account within 3-5 business days.
We’ve sent a short survey to hear your feedback about the return process and overall service.
I completed the survey. Thank you for the smooth refund process and quick responses.
The refund case has been closed as resolved following the successful refund and positive customer feedback.
